text: I want to just do a contour integral of some scalar-valued function f(z)

elements.text: I want to just do a contour integral of some scalar-valued function f(z)

text:
We have `Quadgk.jl` and there is this matlab info page that gives an example of using quadgk to compute a contour integral
which may or may not be relevant
<https://www.mathworks.com/help/matlab/ref/quadgk.html>
see also this from Octave (look for contour) <https://octave.org/doc/v6.1.0/Functions-of-One-Variable.html>

attachments.title: Numerically evaluate integral — Gauss-Kronrod quadrature - MATLAB quadgk
attachments.text: This MATLAB function integrates the function handle fun from a to b using high-order global adaptive quadrature and default error tolerances.
